languages.text: Атака на Даргонус, организованная мстительными ксеносами, была остановлена совместными усилиями Лорд-капитана и {mf|его|ее} подданных. Миру-столице понадобится время на восстановление, однако гибель одного из предводителей рейдов и бегство другого означает хотя бы временное прекращение рейдов.

The attack on Dargonus by vengeful xenos was repelled thanks to the joint efforts of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects. The capital world will need time to rebuild, but the death of one of the leaders of the raids and the flight of another should spell at least a temporary reprieve.
languages.original_text: Атака на Даргонус, организованная мстительными ксеносами, была остановлена совместными усилиями Лорд-капитана и {mf|его|ее} подданных. Миру-столице понадобится время на восстановление, однако гибель одного из предводителей рейдов и бегство другого означает хотя бы временное прекращение рейдов.

traits.locale_text: The attack on Dargonus by vengeful xenos was repelled thanks to the joint efforts of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects. The capital world will need time to rebuild, but the death of one of the leaders of the raids and the flight of another should spell at least a temporary reprieve.

The attack on Dargonus by vengeful xenos was repelled thanks to the joint efforts of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects. The capital world will need time to rebuild, but the death of one of the leaders of the raids and the flight of another should spell at least a temporary reprieve.

The attack on Dargonus by vengeful xenos was repelled thanks to the joint efforts of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects. The capital world will need time to rebuild, but the death of one of the leaders of the raids and the flight of another should spell at least a temporary reprieve.

The attack on Dargonus by vengeful xenos was repelled thanks to the joint efforts of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects. The capital world will need time to rebuild, but the death of one of the leaders of the raids and the flight of another should spell at least a temporary reprieve.

languages.text: 复仇心切的异形袭击了达戈努斯，但在领主舰长与臣民们的共同努力下，敌人的袭击被击退了。尽管首都世界需要一定时间才能恢复原状，但异形其中一位领袖被击毙，另一位领袖逃之夭夭，这至少可以让异形的袭击暂时缓和一段时间。
languages.original_text: The attack on Dargonus by vengeful xenos was repelled thanks to the joint efforts of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects. The capital world will need time to rebuild, but the death of one of the leaders of the raids and the flight of another should spell at least a temporary reprieve.

traits.locale_text: 复仇心切的异形袭击了达戈努斯，但在领主舰长与臣民们的共同努力下，敌人的袭击被击退了。尽管首都世界需要一定时间才能恢复原状，但异形其中一位领袖被击毙，另一位领袖逃之夭夭，这至少可以让异形的袭击暂时缓和一段时间。

languages.text: 復讐に燃える異種族によるダルゴナスへの攻撃は、ロード・キャプテンとその臣下たちの力を合わせた努力の甲斐あって撃退された。首都惑星の再建には時間がかかるだろうが、襲撃リーダーの一人が死亡し、もう一人が逃亡したことで、少なくとも一時的な猶予は得られるはずだ。
languages.original_text: The attack on Dargonus by vengeful xenos was repelled thanks to the joint efforts of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects. The capital world will need time to rebuild, but the death of one of the leaders of the raids and the flight of another should spell at least a temporary reprieve.

traits.locale_text: 復讐に燃える異種族によるダルゴナスへの攻撃は、ロード・キャプテンとその臣下たちの力を合わせた努力の甲斐あって撃退された。首都惑星の再建には時間がかかるだろうが、襲撃リーダーの一人が死亡し、もう一人が逃亡したことで、少なくとも一時的な猶予は得られるはずだ。

languages.text: Fue posible rechazar el ataque a Dargonus de los xenos vengativos gracias a los esfuerzos combinados de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y sus súbditos. El mundo capital necesitará tiempo para la reconstrucción, pero la muerte de uno de los líderes de las incursiones y la huida del otro debería suponer al menos una tregua.
languages.original_text: The attack on Dargonus by vengeful xenos was repelled thanks to the joint efforts of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects. The capital world will need time to rebuild, but the death of one of the leaders of the raids and the flight of another should spell at least a temporary reprieve.

traits.locale_text: Fue posible rechazar el ataque a Dargonus de los xenos vengativos gracias a los esfuerzos combinados de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y sus súbditos. El mundo capital necesitará tiempo para la reconstrucción, pero la muerte de uno de los líderes de las incursiones y la huida del otro debería suponer al menos una tregua.

languages.text: Der Angriff auf Dargonus durch rachsüchtige Xenos wurde dank der vereinten Bemühungen des Lord Captains und {mf|seiner|ihrer} Untertanen abgewehrt. Der Wiederaufbau der Hauptwelt wird eine Weile dauern, aber der Tod eines Anführers der Raubzüge und die Flucht eines anderen sollte wenigstens für eine kurze Verschnaufpause sorgen.
languages.original_text: The attack on Dargonus by vengeful xenos was repelled thanks to the joint efforts of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects. The capital world will need time to rebuild, but the death of one of the leaders of the raids and the flight of another should spell at least a temporary reprieve.

traits.locale_text: Der Angriff auf Dargonus durch rachsüchtige Xenos wurde dank der vereinten Bemühungen des Lord Captains und {mf|seiner|ihrer} Untertanen abgewehrt. Der Wiederaufbau der Hauptwelt wird eine Weile dauern, aber der Tod eines Anführers der Raubzüge und die Flucht eines anderen sollte wenigstens für eine kurze Verschnaufpause sorgen.

languages.text: L'attaque sur Dargonus menée par des xénos vindicatifs a été repoussée grâce à l'action commune {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et de ses sujets. Le monde-capitale aura besoin de temps pour se reconstruire, mais la mort de l'un des chefs des raids et la fuite d'un autre devrait au moins lui accorder un répit temporaire.
languages.original_text: The attack on Dargonus by vengeful xenos was repelled thanks to the joint efforts of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects. The capital world will need time to rebuild, but the death of one of the leaders of the raids and the flight of another should spell at least a temporary reprieve.

traits.locale_text: L'attaque sur Dargonus menée par des xénos vindicatifs a été repoussée grâce à l'action commune {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et de ses sujets. Le monde capitale aura besoin de temps pour se reconstruire, mais la mort de l'un des chefs des raids et la fuite d'un autre devrait au moins lui accorder un répit temporaire.

languages.text: İntikam peşindeki zenoların Dargonus'a düzenlediği saldırı, Lord Kaptan ve emrindekilerin ortak çabaları sayesinde püskürtüldü. Başdünyadaki yeniden inşa çalışmaları zaman alacak olsa da baskın liderlerinin birinin ölümü ve bir diğerinin kaçışı, geçici bir ferahlama anlamına geliyor.
languages.original_text: The attack on Dargonus by vengeful xenos was repelled thanks to the joint efforts of the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects. The capital world will need time to rebuild, but the death of one of the leaders of the raids and the flight of another should spell at least a temporary reprieve.

traits.locale_text: İntikam peşindeki zenoların Dargonus'a düzenlediği saldırı, Lord Kaptan ve emrindekilerin ortak çabaları sayesinde püskürtüldü. Başdünyada yeniden inşa için zaman gerekiyor ancak baskın liderlerinin birinin ölümü ve bir diğerinin kaçışı, geçici bir ferahlama anlamına geliyor.
